item.description:
Have fun learning how to create handmade cards and other projects, all with the help of Stampin' Up! products. Plus, you'll get to make your own hand-stamped creation too!"

Preview projects here: http://www.stampinup....

Location at Milford Home. Yes replies will be emailed address.

Have you ever tried scrapbooking? Wouldn't it be great to create a photo album for all those photos you have in boxes? Would you love to have them decorated in an album you made yourself? Perhaps take a photo and decorate it and put it in a frame for a gift? How about making your own Holiday cards to send out, personally made by you! Ever thought of making All Occasion Cards to have on hand for that unexpected birthday or anniversary? Well, come to this event and have fun learning how to create handmade cards and other projects. Stampin' Up products produce eye catching hand made cards and scrapbooking pages that you can learn to make yourself. Whether you enjoy cardmaking, scrapbooking, gift giving, wedding invitations, birth announcements, birthday cards or even home decor - you'll find all these creative ideas and tips at this house party. RSVP today!
item.name: Creative crafts with Stampin'Up
